creator: jlcarver
title: Building A Basic Infographic
description: This project explains how to create a basic infographic, which is an effective way to convey information to an audience in a creative and interesting manner.
steps: Pick your subject and narrow it down. Determine your audience. Analyze your data. Determine what are the most important points you want your audience to remember.
Choose your headline, making it brief and specific. Choose your font(s), ensuring they match your subject and are legible.
Choose your subheads to break down the infographic into key sections.
Choose your color scheme, selecting colors that best represent your subject.
Determine how to graphically represent your most important points, choosing images that the audience will remember.
Apply the graphics to coordinate with the information presented, and cite your sources if you use graphics produced by others.
